Lakewood.Franklin Pierce High School:
Franklin Pierce High School in Parkland, Washington is named after the fourteenth US President, Franklin Pierce, who was president when the Washington Territory was formed in 1853.

== Music ==
Music at Franklin Pierce High School has a rich history. The bands enjoyed the leadership of Thomas Anderson through the 1970s and 1980s continuing with Ivan Giddings in the 1990s.
